headline: 5 Reasons to Buy United Airlines Stock Like There's No Tomorrow
summary: United Airlines (NASDAQ: UAL) stock has increased by 148% over the last year, but that doesn't mean it isn't still a great value opportunity.  Here are five reasons why United Airlines could be an excellent stock for your portfolio.  The airline entered 2025 in great shape.

headline: United Airlines Faces A Tough Future
summary: United Airlines' post-covid growth outperforms many stocks, focusing on international markets. Learn why UAL stock faces challenges despite strong performance.
